title: Bridging the inference gap in Mutimodal Variational Autoencoders
details: A Senellart, S Allassonnière - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.03952, 2025
abstract: From medical diagnosis to autonomous vehicles, critical applications rely on the integration of multiple heterogeneous data modalities. Multimodal Variational Autoencoders offer versatile and scalable methods for generating unobserved …
